description.value:
You can summon the aid of creatures driven by their very nature to destroy evil.

Prerequisites
Good alignment.

Benefits
When casting summon monster, you also gain access to the list of good monsters below. Your righteous determination grants these summoned creatures the Diehard feat. You may still summon creatures from the standard list, but without the Diehard feat.

1st Level
Celestial dog (NG)
Celestial dolphin (NG)
Celestial eagle (NG)
Celestial fire beetle (NG)
Celestial pony (NG)
Celestial viper (NG)

2nd Level
Celestial octopus (NG)
Celestial wolf (NG)
Faun (CG)
Grig (without fiddle ability) (NG)
Pseudodragon (NG)

3rd Level
Blink dog (LG)
Celestial shark (NG)
Foo dog (NG)
Lantern archon (LG)
Lyrakien azata (CG)
Silvanshee agathion (NG)

4th Level
Celestial dire wolf (NG)
Celestial giant eagle (NG)
Celestial pegasus (CG)
Faerie dragon (NG)
Foo lion (NG)
Hound archon (LG)
Pixie (NG)

5th Level
Bralani azata (GC)
Celestial orca (NG)
Djinni (CG)
Unicorn (CG)
Vulpinal agathion (NG)

6th Level
Celestial giant octopus (NG)
Kirin (LG)
Legion archon (LG)
Lillend azata (LG)
Wood giant (CG)

7th Level
Celestial dire shark (NG)
Celestial roc (NG)
Movanic deva (NG)
Shedu (LG)
Shield archon (LG)
Treant (NG)
Young bronze dragon (LG)

8th Level
Cloud giant (NG)
Dragon horse (NG)
Lammasu (LG)
Monadic deva (NG)
Young gold dragon (LG)

9th Level
Astral deva (NG)
Couatl (LG)
Ghaele azata (CG)
Leonal agathion (NG)
Storm giant (CG)
Trumpet archon (LG)
